1.0.name: wordpress/customized-plugin-notice
1.0.description:
WordPress plugin to show predefined message below each plugin row in the plugin page. Useful for developers who frequently customized wordpress plugin to suite client need. Allow you to select plugins from list for which you want to show notice.

Features:

  • Option to change notice text.
  • Option to change background color and text color of notice bar.
  • Option to select multiple plugins from list.

For more information see: Customized Plugin Notice plugin
